content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy During the Christmas and New Year vacation period there will be changes to our normal library opening hours. All libraries re-open on Tuesday 2 January. Djanogly Learning Resource Centre Computer Room open 24/7 James Cameron-Gifford Library Silent Study and computer rooms open 24/7 via Main Building Business | Denis Arnold Music | Djanogly Learning Resource Centre | George Green | Greenfield Medical | Hallward | James Cameron-Gifford | Manuscripts and Special Collections Standard hours Mon - Fri: 8am - 9.45pm Saturday: 9am - 4.45pm Sunday: 9.30am - 4.45pm Term time hours Mon - Fri: 9.30am - 7pm Saturday: 1pm - 5pm Sunday: Closed Vacation hours Mon - Fri: 9.30am - 4.30pm Sat and Sun: Closed The computer room is available 24/7. 8am - 9:45pm 9am - 4:45pm 9:30am - 4:45pm 24-hour opening Back the top Standard hours Mon - Fri: 8am - 9.45pm Saturday: 9am - 5pm Sunday: 9.30am - 5.45pm 9am - 8:45pm 9:30am - 8:45pm 8:30am - 8:45pm The silent study room and B floor computer rooms are available 24/7 via the Main Building. Reservations will continue to be active throughout the Christmas vacation and books may be recalled. If you are leaving campus over the vacation: Log in to NUsearch for details of your loans, requests and fines. Our Library staff can help you to cancel any reservations you no longer need. King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR Please see our Help and support page for telephone and email contact points
